name: Jahu Island Crash
description:
You are no longer the only resident in the distant Jahu Island. A seemingly alien spaceship has crashed on your shore and trashed the whole place. What a mess! It's time to fix the situation and get inside that ship.

Can you gather all your bananas and find the secrets within that hunk of metal and wooden boxes???

Jahu Island Crash is a short 3D platformer. It was made for a university game development course, in roughly two months.
Unpack the downloaded zip file and open the executable file to play.
